title: Season 7 Difficulty?
body:
I used to have at least a 60% winrate on all of my accounts for Diana.
Now, my low silver accounts have a 38% and 46% winrate.
Also, my gold account only has a 55% winrate (mostly due to AFKers).

What has caused the sudden increase in tanks and bruisers compared to season 6?
Or has there been some change to AP/Diana which I don't know about?

{{champion:131}}

replies.body: AP diana is stronger than she was before. The simple fact is this game doesn't actually have tanks, considering most "tanks" can match or even do more than most carries, so in that respect they are better, take more. deal around the same, and have a lot more cc too.
